message: Let's start fair. I propose we split the money 60/40, with me getting the larger share.  It's a good starting point!
You wanted to start with a 60/40 split, but I think I can do better than that. How about I take a bigger share this time?
I understand you want a bigger share, but I think 40/60 is a more reasonable split considering the inflation we are facing. Let's be a bit more realistic and try to reach a compromise.
I'm not willing to accept a 40/60 split. I think I can do a bit better than that. How about 85/15 this time?
I'm not sure why you're pushing for such a large share, but I'm willing to compromise. 30/70 is my final offer before we both lose out on the rest of the money.
You're getting desperate, and I'm getting greedy. 90/10 is my new offer. Take it or leave it!
We're both losing money with every round. I think we need to be more reasonable here. 20/80 is my final offer - it's better than both of us getting nothing.
You're trying to lowball me, but I'm not going to fall for it. 92/8 is my new offer. Don't think I'm getting desperate, I'm just getting smart!
We're down to the wire here, Bob. It's either 10/90 or we both get nothing. Take it or leave it.
